abstract: Philip Robert-Tissot, Citigroup’s chairman for mergers and acquisitions for Europe, the Middle East and Africa, will become the next chief of the Takeover Panel of Britain, an independent regulator that oversees deals in the country.
snippet: Philip Robert-Tissot, Citigroup’s chairman for mergers and acquisitions for Europe, the Middle East and Africa, will become the next chief of the Takeover Panel of Britain, an independent regulator that oversees deals in the country.
lead_paragraph: LONDON – Philip Robert-Tissot, Citigroup’s chairman for mergers and acquisitions for Europe, the Middle East and Africa, will become director general of the Takeover Panel of Britain, an independent regulator that oversees deals in the country.

headline.main: Citigroup Deal Maker to Lead British Takeover Panel
